content: quick and easy beginner pattern for a twisted crochet cup cozy you ll use under 35 yards of yarn and only 30 minutes to make your own cute coffee sleeve the pattern is available for free with ads on my blog https //www youshouldcraft com/twisted-crochet-cup-cozy-pattern **materials ** 25-32 yards of brava worsted or your favorite worsted weight yarn h 5 0 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors **share your twisted crochet cup cozy ** if you crochet a twisted cup cozy please share it with me on instagram tag me @youshouldcraft or use hashtag #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
